title: Nextcloud macOS Migration Project
job_overview:
Summary
Nextcloud + Keycloak + (Optional) OpenLDAP Expert Needed for Secure File Server Migration

Description:
We’re looking for an experienced contractor with real-world expertise in Nextcloud, Keycloak SSO, and optionally OpenLDAP, to migrate a macOS Server-based file system to Nextcloud. This is a time-sensitive project, expected to be completed in 30 days or less.

This is not a learning opportunity. Only apply if you’ve already delivered similar projects.

Project Overview:
    •    Current server: macOS Server (10.12.6) running WebDAV-style shares
    •    Target: Nextcloud on Azure (already deployed)
    •    Keycloak is running (used for other services)
    •    File data has not yet been migrated
    •    OpenLDAP is not yet in use, but may be required

What You’ll Do:
    •    Assess the macOS Server’s folder/user/group permissions
    •    Migrate all files to Nextcloud
    •    Match original permissions using native or LDAP-based group structures
    •    Integrate Keycloak for SSO authentication
    •    Deploy and configure OpenLDAP only if required
    •    Deliver documentation for all changes/configs

Requirements:
    •    Production-grade Nextcloud deployment experience
    •    Keycloak SSO integration (especially with file services)
    •    Deep understanding of group/user-based file permissions
    •    Self-directed, remote work experience
    •    Must provide working examples, references, and proof of experience

Nice to Have:
    •    LDAP deployment/configuration
    •    Familiarity with Azure hosting and networking
    •    Bash or Python scripting
    •    Background in macOS, WebDAV, or SMB file systems

Payment Terms:
    •    Firm project quote required before hire
    •    You’re welcome to ask any questions needed to generate your quote
    •    We suggest a range of $35–$65/hr USD, but final quote will be milestone-based
    •    Paid via Upwork
    •    Deadline: 14 calendar days from start
    •    Remote only; preference for overlap with US Central Time

To Apply, please Include:
    1.    Brief description of your most relevant similar project
    2.    Access to a demo environment or screenshots of prior setups
    3.    Your questions (if any) to generate a firm quote
    4.    Your references or client feedback

Only candidates who demonstrate proven experience will be contacted.
